Sentencas: A novel configuration of a tri-generation process for poultry litter valorization, including gasification, solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), and combined heat and power system was examined in this research.
Titulo: Poultry litter valorization: Development and optimization of an electro-chemical and thermal tri-generation process using an extreme gradient boosting algorithm

Sentencas: Multi-level factorial, design of experiment methodology has been adopted to extract the simulation data from Aspen Plus simulation model by changing one parameter at a time.
Titulo: Poultry litter valorization: Development and optimization of an electro-chemical and thermal tri-generation process using an extreme gradient boosting algorithm

Sentencas: Extreme gradient boosting has been applied on the factorial design data to predict and optimize the parametric yield of this model.
Titulo: Poultry litter valorization: Development and optimization of an electro-chemical and thermal tri-generation process using an extreme gradient boosting algorithm

Sentencas: Results of gasification process sensitivity analysis show that pressure has no significant effect on output yield, but it has a negative effect on SOFC voltage.
Titulo: Poultry litter valorization: Development and optimization of an electro-chemical and thermal tri-generation process using an extreme gradient boosting algorithm

Sentencas: While gasification process temperature operating condition around 600 degrees C and 0.25-0.33 biomass to air ratio (BMR) can generate optimum hydrogen yield in syngas.
Titulo: Poultry litter valorization: Development and optimization of an electro-chemical and thermal tri-generation process using an extreme gradient boosting algorithm

Sentencas: Coefficient of determinant (R2) for Extreme Gradient Booster (XGB) model is greater than 0.97 for all dependent variables.
Titulo: Poultry litter valorization: Development and optimization of an electro-chemical and thermal tri-generation process using an extreme gradient boosting algorithm

Sentencas: According to XGB results, BMR is the most contributing factor which affects the output of this study.
Titulo: Poultry litter valorization: Development and optimization of an electro-chemical and thermal tri-generation process using an extreme gradient boosting algorithm

Sentencas: Exergy efficiency of this tri-generation process is 34.6% more than the gasification process.
Titulo: Poultry litter valorization: Development and optimization of an electro-chemical and thermal tri-generation process using an extreme gradient boosting algorithm

Sentencas: Therefore, based on the findings of this model, it is concluded that this trigeneration process could be the better possible solution for poultry litter valorization.
Titulo: Poultry litter valorization: Development and optimization of an electro-chemical and thermal tri-generation process using an extreme gradient boosting algorithm
